Detailed Description

template<typename LockType = NullLock>
class bucket_chain_< LockType >

bucket_chain, represents a bucket of our array hash.

It has fixed size and an pointer to next bucket_chain element. It uses a char* member str to store item(binary) sequentially. When full, items will be stored to next bucket_chain element.

template<typename LockType = NullLock>
void bucket_chain_< LockType >::unload (  )  [inline]

unload a buck_chain element. It releases most of the memory, and was used to recycle memory when cache is full.
